phrases: I just realised it for the first time
That I had fallen in love
Twenty-four hours a day thinking of you, you and nothing more than you!
It is something I was not consciously aware of
Somehow ( somehow) I am feeling different from the usual
With you ( the two of us) and our dull chatter
Do not tell me ( mutual love?)
Nope, it is a one-sided crush
Why is my heart pounding like this?
Did a short circuit just make a mess out of my mind?
This is my first time... feeling like this...
I wonder if I have a fever
Suddenly and precipitately, love has arrived.
Instantly igniting my face into a bright red
Is this really what they call love?
I want to know your feelings.
I feel I could fly towards the sky
Woke up in the morning, brushed my teeth
In the blink of an eye, it is 10pm
Today, we laughed a whole lot
At times, with my friends, acting like fools, being noisy
I would not call this my first love
Say, will we be able to meet again tomorrow?
I see you sparkling all over the place
Today was fun, too, was not it?
It is my pleasure to meet you, my new-found love.
Surely, we will meet again tomorrow
We will meet immediately in our dreams
Doing this kind of thing again...
Well, if the traps are of this level, I do not mind getting trapped.
This was going to be the side dish for today's lunch.
We do not have one now.
No, Sakamoto said he wanted to eat it.
Why do you start saying things like this?
Let us go eat ice cream from in front of the station!
Do not you think she wants to go to school?
I do not want you to go!
What is with this, all of a sudden?
Nano is going to go somewhere...
That is not what I meant!
I am thinking of going shopping in the morning...
Professor will come along with you, too!
I will not buy you anything.
I want to buy Chocolate Sharks!
I said that I will not buy them.
People have been telling me that since this morning.
The balance of your speech is having a Gestalt Breakdown!
Seems like you have a fever, too.
Why did you come to school in that state?
I was thinking that I would show you that magic show I have been telling you about.
I have not heard anything about that.
You are in no state to be talking about magic.
I even practised, so you will be surprised when you see my magic!
The truth is that I am already surprised.
First of all, take your sea -
I will just pretend that I did not see that.
She did come all this way in that state.
But Yukko was going bring out a big trick -
I wonder how weakened she is that she did not notice the dove and the wand.
I will pass a cigarette through a one hundred-yen coin.
They are all Ace of Hearts!
something came flying out of her mouth.
What kind of trick were you planning?
You should just sleep right now.
Well, I am off to the supermarket.
Since you were not behaving, I will not buy you anything!
I feel bad for you, Sakamoto.
What are you buying today, Nano?
But they are not snacks, though...
You cannot buy anything, even if they are not snacks.
Then I am not too sure what I can buy.
You really do want to buy something.
Nano, it is a shark castella!
It looks like there is a stand.
Since it looks delicious, shall we have some?
I am not buying anything for you today.
But it is a gift for Sakamoto.
Sakamoto did some bad things, too, so no.
I was going to give it to Nano, actually.
If I treat her here, she will do the same thing again.
I need to clear my mind.
So in the end, you bought it for her.
always throwing tantrums for some reason or another.
I think I will teach her a lesson.
Hurry up and learn about self-restraint.
The Shinonome household was at peace again today.
You can do it if you try!
What is the secret behind that good mark?
Should I teach you the secret to getting eighty points?
You do not have to tell me.
Dad, I have come to make food for you!
Mum's still on her trip, right?
Well, I will play with my grandson all day today...
Mii-chan, what do you want to do today?
Instead of that, where is your registered seal?
TL note: An official stamp that can be used in place of a signature.
Someone else could forge legal documents in your name with it.
What did you think the time to meet up was?
I meant to get on the bus...
I was on a wave known as time.
Let us just go to town like this!
I kind of need to go pee a little bit.
Borscht is a type of food.
TL note: Borscht is a type of Eastern European soup.
It is okay, only a little.
Anyway, just hurry up and go to the washroom.
Sakamoto was being careful not to speak too loudly.
This is why I hate kids.
I guess she cannot go to the bathroom alone this late at night when a storm like this is raging...
I will go with her and make her feel grateful to me again.
It cannot be helped, so I will go with you.
Sakamoto is small and looks weak, so it is fine.
Do not you think she wants to go to school?
Oh, Professor, you came over here?
Nano, come go pee with me.
Well, I do not really need to, but...
I am just a tiny bit scared, so come with me.
You should have just woken me up.
It is making a lot of noise.
It is probably the chimney banging around.
But it is raining really hard.
Let us just get this over with and go back to our futons.
It might be scary alone, but I think it is okay if we are together.
Nano, do you want to go to school?
No, I will stay at home forever.
But Sakamoto said that Nano wants to go to school!
A month goes by so quickly, yet Sundays always seem so far away.
Next stop is the eightieth one.
The exit is to the right.
I will sing you a song about 80s, since it is 80 points.
I will announce the average score for this test.
What the heck are you doing so suddenly?!
Stop playing around and help me fold up the laundry.
You can go to school starting tomorrow.
What is with this, all of a sudden?
It is the Professor's wise decision.
Now I can eat lots of snacks in the afternoon and not get in trouble.
But Professor, I will not be able to wear a backpack like this.
TL note: In Japan, backpacks are only worn by elementary school students.
You are going to high school.
But Professor, you will have to take off this key, or else -
I love you so much, Professor!
I am the flags of the world.
You often hear it pronounced both bankokki and bankokuki in Japanese,
Do not sweat the small stuff!
